:headers.description: Set the header of the uploaded request

:data.description: Extra parameters that come with the upload
:data.description_zh: 上传时附带的额外参数

name.description: The name of the uploaded file field

with-credentials.description: Support for sending cookie credential information
with-credentials.description_zh: 支持发送 cookie 凭证信息

show-file-list.description: Whether to display a list of uploaded files
show-file-list.description_zh: 是否显示已上传文件列表

accept.description: Accept the uploaded [file type] (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#attr-accept) (this parameter is not valid in thumbnail-mode mode)
accept.description_zh: 接受上传的[文件类型](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#attr-accept)（thumbnail-mode 模式下此参数无效）

:before-upload.description: If the hook before uploading the file is the uploaded file, if it returns false or returns a Promise and is rejected, the upload will be stopped.
:before-upload.description_zh: 上传文件之前的钩子，参数为上传的文件，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则停止上传。

:before-remove.description: The hook before deleting a file, the parameter is the uploaded file and file list, if it returns false or returns a promise and is rejected, the deletion will be stopped.
:before-remove.description_zh: 删除文件之前的钩子，参数为上传的文件和文件列表，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则停止删除。

auto-upload.description: Whether to upload files as soon as they are selected
auto-upload.description_zh: 是否在选取文件后立即进行上传

:file-list.description: List of uploaded files, for example: [{name: 'food.jpg', url: 'https://xxx.cdn.com/xxx.jpg'}]
:file-list.description_zh: 上传的文件列表, 例如: [{name: 'food.jpg', url: 'https://xxx.cdn.com/xxx.jpg'}]

:http-request.description: Override the default upload behavior, and you can customize the implementation of the upload
:http-request.description_zh: 覆盖默认的上传行为，可以自定义上传的实现

:limit.description: The maximum number of uploads allowed

:on-preview.description: Click the hook when you upload a file in the file list
:on-preview.description_zh: 点击文件列表中已上传的文件时的钩子

:on-remove.description: Hook when removing a file from the file list
:on-remove.description_zh: 文件列表移除文件时的钩子

:on-success.description: The hook when the file is successfully uploaded
:on-success.description_zh: 文件上传成功时的钩子

:on-error.description: Hook when a file upload fails
:on-error.description_zh: 文件上传失败时的钩子

:on-progress.description: Hooks when the file is uploaded

:on-change.description: The hook when the file status changes, is called when the file is added, when the upload is successful, and when the upload fails
:on-change.description_zh: 文件状态改变时的钩子，添加文件、上传成功和上传失败时都会被调用

:on-exceed.description: Hook when the number of files exceeds the limit
:on-exceed.description_zh: 文件超出个数限制时的钩子

methods.name: clearFiles
methods.description: Clear the list of uploaded files (this method cannot be called in before-upload)
methods.description_zh: 清空已上传的文件列表（该方法不支持在 before-upload 中调用）

methods.name: abort
methods.params: （ file: fileList 中的 file 对象 ）

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Manually upload a list of files

slots.name: trigger
slots.description: Triggers the contents of the file selection box
slots.description_zh: 触发文件选择框的内容
